SGBotic:
Makecode block for real time clock

SGBotic blocks
SGBotic.bcd2dec: bcd2dec -- convert binary-coded decimal (BCD) to decimal
SGBotic.dec2bcd: dec2bcd -- convert decimal to binary-coded decimal (BCD)
SGBotic.rtc_alarmStatus: Get alarm status. Function returns 1 if activated
SGBotic.rtc_getRegister: get register value. For debug purpose.
SGBotic.rtc_setAlarm1|param|alarm1Hour: is the alarm1 Hour to be set, eg: 1
SGBotic.rtc_setAlarm1|param|alarm1Minute: is the alarm1 Minute to be set, eg: 2
SGBotic.rtc_setAlarm1|param|alarm1Second: is the alarm1 Second to be set, eg: 3
SGBotic.rtc_setAlarm2|param|alarm2Hour: is the alarm2 Hour to be set, eg: 1
SGBotic.rtc_setAlarm2|param|alarm2Minute: is the alarm2 Minute to be set, eg: 2
SGBotic.rtc_setDateTime|param|day: is the day to be set, eg: 22
SGBotic.rtc_setDateTime|param|hour: is the Hour to be set, eg: 10
SGBotic.rtc_setDateTime|param|minute: is the Minute to be set, eg: 39
SGBotic.rtc_setDateTime|param|month: is the Month to be set, eg: 5
SGBotic.rtc_setDateTime|param|second: is the Second to be set, eg: 1
SGBotic.rtc_setDateTime|param|year: is the Year to be set, eg: 2018
